title: Did not get the $20 dollars RP I bought
body: I just decided to post here in hopes of getting a GM's attention. I submitted a ticket and also tried reloging a few times in hopes of it refreshing, and still no RP. I noticed that the confirmation to my purchase was taking a long time to go through so I just exited out. I hope that wasn't the cause of this problem.

replies.body: Which payment method did you choose? Usually, you will get your money back after 24 hours. Otherwise contact the support.

I want to echo what AmShaegar mentioned.  If you can confirm you were charged, and do not see the RP in your account within 24 hours, make sure that you update the ticket you submitted, and a Billing Specialist will investigate it!

a billing specialest eh? probably the only customer support part of riot that actually tries to be useful unlike the rest of ur support staff that just seems to make it their goal to be absolutly trash and toxic to ur players.
Harsh words. Any proof? I know of some replies that did not fit the question but toxic? Also, you cannot reason that from speaking of some examples.
